SEARCH
Package utility

Class MedicalRecord

java.lang.Object
utility.MedicalRecord
public class MedicalRecord extends Object
Represents the medical record of a patient, containing details such as personal information, contact details, blood type, and history of diagnoses and treatments. Provides methods to manage and update the patient's medical information.
Since:
2024-11-21

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MedicalRecord(String patientID, String name, String dateOfBirth, String gender, String phoneNumber, String emailAddress, String bloodType)

    Constructs a MedicalRecord with the specified patient information, past diagnoses, and treatments.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord(String patientID, String name, String dateOfBirth, String gender, String phoneNumber, String emailAddress, String bloodType)
      Constructs a MedicalRecord with the specified patient information and initializes empty lists for past diagnoses and treatments.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique ID of the patient
      name - the full name of the patient
      dateOfBirth - the date of birth of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the patient
      emailAddress - the email address of the patient
      bloodType - the blood type of the patient

    • MedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord(String patientID, String name, String dateOfBirth, String gender, String phoneNumber, String emailAddress, String bloodType, ArrayList<String> pastDiagnoses, ArrayList<String> pastTreatments)
      Constructs a MedicalRecord with the specified patient information, past diagnoses, and treatments.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique ID of the patient
      name - the full name of the patient
      dateOfBirth - the date of birth of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the patient
      emailAddress - the email address of the patient
      bloodType - the blood type of the patient
      pastDiagnoses - a list of the patient's past diagnoses
      pastTreatments - a list of the patient's past treatments
